channel.title: CVE Feed for glib -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for glib -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-32643|2024-08-02T15:25:36.404Z -- glib -- glib
item.description: A flaw was found in GLib. The GVariant deserialization code is vulnerable to a heap buffer overflow introduced by the fix for CVE-2023-32665. This bug does not affect any released version of GLib, but does affect GLib distributors who followed the guidance of GLib developers to backport the initial fix for CVE-2023-32665.

item.title: CVE-2023-32636|2024-08-02T15:25:36.370Z -- glib -- glib
item.description: A flaw was found in glib, where the gvariant deserialization code is vulnerable to a denial of service introduced by additional input validation added to resolve CVE-2023-29499. The offset table validation may be very slow. This bug does not affect any released version of glib but does affect glib distributors who followed the guidance of glib developers to backport the initial fix for CVE-2023-29499.
